sentence.Network_en: He crouched on the veranda of the office and waited for someone important - looking to come out.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜷缩在办公室外面的走廊上,他在等着某个重要人物出现.

sentence.Network_en: She studied him for the longest time, looking wryly amused.
sentence.Network_cn: 她面带苦笑，盯着他看了很长时间。

sentence.Network_en: He finished his conversation and stood up, looking straight at me.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说完话站起来，直视着我。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 综合英语下册词汇与短... ... demand v. 要求，请求 important-looking adj. 看上去有地位的，好像很重要的 crush v. 使……压绉；压碎.

list.abs: did not look like any important matter , although walked still lamely , but was basically alright ., 看起来没什么大事了 , 虽然行走仍一瘸一拐 , 但是基本上还可以.
move unsteadily and with great difficulty, almost falling 蹒跚;摇摇晃晃地走... with the chest pushed forwards and trying to look important 趾高气扬地走.
...构和顺序排列(时间顺序、空间顺序、逻辑顺序)，最好学会用眼睛扫读的本领，在最短的时间内找到所需信息。3. 把握主要事实(looking for important facts)归纳概括中心主旨的题目是高考必考题目，考查考生通过阅读理解总结归纳，找出文章中心意思的能力。要做好这.

RelatedPhrase.word: attaching importance to content and looking

list.key: attaching importance to content and looking
list.abs: over a long period , Luxun's essays are focal points of study , but there is an inclination of attaching importance to content and looking down on art .长期以来，鲁迅杂文一直是鲁迅研究的一个重点课题，但多年来的研究一直存在一种倾向，那就是重内容轻艺术。
